description.fr:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
invoque un\_monstre.\vEn invoque un supplémentaire par tour de jeu.
<rem>Limité à {value:m} monstres maximum.</rem>
\---
Puis Pose une\_{FloorMechanism:31,plural:one}.
\---
Puis confère {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} et {ARvalue:ar,+} par tour de jeu aux adversaires sauf {Summoning:1440}.
description.en:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
Summons one\_monster.\vSummons an additional one per game turn.
<rem>Limit: {value:m} {m, plural, one[monster] other[monsters]} maximum.</rem>
\---
Then places one\_{FloorMechanism:31,plural:one}.
\---
Then confers {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} and {ARvalue:ar,+} per game turn on opponents except for {Summoning:1440}.
description.es:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
Invoca un\_monstruo.\vInvoca uno más por turno de juego.
<rem>Limitado a {value:m} monstruos como máximo.</rem>
\---
Luego pone una\_{FloorMechanism:31,plural:one}.
\---
Confiere {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} y {ARvalue:ar,+} por turno de juego a todos los adversarios menos a {Summoning:1440}.
description.de:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
Beschwört ein Monster.\vBeschwört ein zusätzliches pro Spielrunde.
<rem>Auf max. {value:m}\_Monster begrenzt.</rem>
\---
Platziert dann eine\_{FloorMechanism:31,plural:one}.
\---
Verleiht anschließend allen Gegnern außer {Summoning:1440} {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} und {ARvalue:ar,+} pro Spielrunde.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
Invoca um\_monstro.\vInvoca um monstro adicional por turno de jogo.
<rem>Limite de {value:m} monstros no máximo.</rem>
\---
Depois, coloca uma\_{FloorMechanism:31,plural:one}.
\---
Em seguida, concede {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} e {ARvalue:ar,+} por turno de jogo aos adversários, exceto {Summoning:1440}.
